title: ReFX Nexus Expansion Packs   - WORKING Hardstyle Expansion -
description:
11 Expansion packs for ReFX Nexus 

Analog Expansion
Bass Expansion
Psytrance Rave Expansion
Dance Drums Expansion
Dance Orchestra Expansion
Dance Vol. 1 Expansion
Hardstyle Hard Trance Rave Expansion (THIS ONE WORKS!!!)
House Vol. 1 Expansion
Perpetual Motion Expansion
Store N Forward Expansion
Stratosphere Expansion

In Nexus, go to SYS -> Import Expansion -> locate the NXP file of the expansion to import. You only need to import each one once.
You'll be able to access the expansions in the library section.


FOR THOSE OF YOU CONFUSED ABOUT NEXUS:
If you have the "0testtone.nxs" error,
are stuck only able to use the "init saw" ROM,
or get an error talking about disk space when you have plenty of it:

You need to go to the ReFX website, Nexus, Downloads, and find the "Nexus Demo Content" download. Download it, (1.4 gigs, I know, fkn huge) and put it in your Nexus VSTi directory. Then open nexus, locate 0testtone.nxs ( content -> Samples -> ROM -> 0TestTone.nxs ), if it asks, and you'll never have that problem again, as well as having Nexus actually work for you, and the ability to use ROM's other than "init saw" lol. 

Hope I've solved a few of your problems, or at the very least provided you with some nice expansions for this amazing VSTi. I think I'm currently the only one offering a working copy of the Hardstyle Hard Trance Expansion on TPB or Demonoid, so KEEP THIS TORRENT SEEDED PLEASE!!!!

Happy Productions!!!
E-Klipz DJ
